name: Assemblea Nacional Catalana
goal:
a) To promote the social and political conditions needed to achieve an independent, with rule of law, social and democratic Catalan State.
b) To bring together all the people who work for similar goals of the Catalan National Assembly, groups, social movements, political parties or individuals.
c) To ease, boost and host all kinds of democratic initiatives focused on the achievement of the goals above.
interests: Borders and Security, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
European chart of Human Rights and fundamental freedoms
Multilinguism
Justice & Home Affairs
